revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sunburst Island |image = [[File:Sunburst Island.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Sunburst Island. |tokens = 43,000 |location = Sevii Island 5, south of Memorial Pillar route. }} '''Sunburst Island''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 720,600 HP. == Encounter Tables == ===Wild Encou..."
